alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Erie; Huron; Sandusky; Seneca (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 12 at 1:31PM EDT until August 12 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 PM EDT FOR WESTERN HURON...EASTERN SENECA...ERIE...SANDUSKY AND NORTHEASTERN CRAWFORD COUNTIES... At 131 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Fremont to 7 miles northeast of Bloomville to near New Washington, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Sandusky, Norwalk, Fremont, Bellevue, Clyde, Willard, Plymouth, Green Springs, New Washington, Bloomville, Castalia, Chatfield, Ballville, Monroeville, Attica, Bettsville, Bay View, Republic, Tiro and Burgoon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for north central and northwestern Ohio. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
